topic.title: Through Spindle Coolant Operation Timing Chart

header.para: Through Spindle Coolant Operation Timing Chart

body.para: The M codes and signals used to control the through spindle function are described in the following table.

para.text: Table <%HMTABLECOUNTER4=2%>.<%HMTABLECOUNTER%>
Details of M Codes and Signals

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

table.style: width:auto; cell-padding:7px; cell-spacing:0px; page-break-inside:auto; border-width:0px; border-spacing:0px; border-collapse:collapse; cell-border-width:1px; border-color:#000000; border-style:solid; background-color:none; head-row-background-color:none; alt-row-background-color:none;

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Name

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Description

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: MS8 (signal)

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Controls the operation of pump motor for through spindle coolant.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: M09 (M code)

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Stops the coolant supply after execution of the specified block.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: M319 (M code)

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Stops the coolant supply without waiting for completion of axis travel and starts spindle orientation.

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: This command does not stop the through spindle coolant drawback function

para.style: text-align:justify; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: (Refer to
). As a result, removal of the coolant inside the tool (via drawback) and axis travel are performed simultaneously, reducing the amount of time it takes.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: M06 (M code)

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Specifies the tool change. The spindle tool is exchanged with the tool indexed to the next tool position. Axis travel cannot be performed during this process.

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:0px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: M26 (M code)

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:3px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Through spindle coolant supply is started.
-NOTE-

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: The machine parameter No. 07051 is set to specify whether or not to stop the through spindle coolant pump after the coolant stop process. This function is used when M319 is specified during discharge of coolant.

para.style: text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:8px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

text-align:left; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;
para.text: Tool change when through spindle coolant is stopped by M06/M09/M319

para.style: text-align:center; text-indent:0px; margin-top:0px; margin-right:0px; margin-bottom:7px; margin-left:0px; line-height:1.00; background-color:transparent; white-space:normal; page-break-inside:auto; page-break-after:auto; border:none; tabstops:none;

para.text: Figure <%HMFIGURECOUNTER4=2%>.<%HMFIGURECOUNTER%>
Through Spindle Coolant Operating Timing Chart
